overview: Narrating Nazmi who is also disabled (OKU) has an online business with the help of her cousin, Rafi.  One day, Nazmi sent an order for goods to a customer named Ilya, a deaf and mute girl.  Nazmi is attracted by Ilya's personality. He wanted to get to know the girl better but Mrs. Juha, Ilya's mother objected to their relationship.  Did Nazmi manage to edit Ilya as his wife?
title: Aku Nazmi
